name: Scaffold Stark
postCreateCommand: bash -c 'git clone https://github.com/asdf-vm/asdf.git ~/.asdf --branch v0.14.0 && . ~/.asdf/asdf.sh && asdf plugin add scarb https://github.com/software-mansion/asdf-scarb.git && asdf plugin add starknet-devnet https://github.com/gianalarcon/asdf-starknet-devnet.git && asdf install scarb 2.12.2 && asdf install starknet-devnet 0.6.1 && asdf global scarb 2.12.2 && snfoundryup -v 0.51.1 && echo "export ASDF_DATA_DIR=\"\$HOME/.asdf\"" >> ~/.bashrc && echo ". \"\$HOME/.asdf/asdf.sh\"" >> ~/.bashrc && echo "export PATH=\"\$HOME/.asdf/shims:\$HOME/.local/bin:\$PATH\"" >> ~/.bashrc'
